title: A Whaling voyage
creator_credit: Education Development Center Film Studio and John Friedman
brief_description: Shows the preparation and the voyage of a whaling ship working under sail, killing and rendering a large whale. Contains an excerpt from a 1922 feature - Elmer Clifton’s “Down to the sea in ships”.
creator_credit_for_label: Education Development Center Film Studio and John Friedman
